StoryText: My coworkers %FullName:NPC:1% and %FullName:NPC:2% want to go drink beers in the back room and invite me.

OptionText.Text: Say no thanks, I don't want to get in trouble.
Say yes, but suggest the back parking lot

OptionResult.Result: They both think I am lame and end up getting caught by our boss %FullName:NPC:3% and then they blame me!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:3% is glad I don't get caught up in any of this stuff. But %FullName:NPC:1% and %FullName:NPC:2% get mad at me. They seem to think it's my fault. Like I told someone. They're the idiots who went drinking where there are security cameras!

OptionResult.Result: We all end up getting caught by our boss %FullName:NPC:3%.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: We ended up having a pretty good time together. But then %FullName:NPC:3% caught us through the security cameras and we all get in trouble and have to pay money for the offense.

No cameras back there, the three of us get to hang out and have a great time and then get back to work later on when we feel like it! What a day!
